description.en:
The characteristics of "First Love" Disease are:
1. The majority of the patients are in their teens,
2. Those patients are in love with someone,
3. There formed a heart-shaped scar on the patient's body.

Haejin Jeong never caught the disease, even though all of her friends had. But when she hit 24 years old, two men miraculously appeared in her life as if it were fate. The question is, which one is her first love?


---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Menunggu-Cinta-Pertama/2781)

description.id:
Ciri-ciri penyakit ‘Cinta Pertama’: satu, kebanyakan pasien terjangkit ‘Cinta Pertama’ pada umur belasan tahun. Kedua, ada seseorang yang disukai pasien. Ketiga, adanya bekas luka berbentuk hati di salah satu bagian tubuh pasien. Semua teman sekolahnya sudah terjangkit ‘Cinta Pertama’, hanya Haejin saja yang belum! Saat umur 24 tahun, ada dua pria yang muncul di sisinya bagai takdir. Jadi, siapakah yang akan jadi cinta pertama Haejin selama 24 tahun ini?

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Menunggu-Cinta-Pertama/2781)

description.ko:
첫사랑을 하나의 바이러스로 분류하는 세상. 아직 첫사랑에 걸려본 적 없는 24살 해진에게 어느 날, 
운명처럼 서로 다른 두 남자가 그녀 앞에 나타났다. 과연, 해진에게 첫사랑을 앓게 한 남자는!?

---
